My Side Projects
-------------------------------------

* **[slackr](https://matthewrkaye.com/slackr/)** is an R package for connecting R to Slack
* **[fitbitr](https://matthewrkaye.com/fitbitr/)** is an R package to make it easy to ingest your Fitbit data into R
* **[lightMLFlow](https://github.com/collegevine/lightMLFlow)** is an opinionated R wrapper for the MLFlow REST API
* **[bdb2021](https://hjmbigdatabowl.github.io/bdb2021/articles/submission.html)** is my team's submission to the 2021 NFL Big Data Bowl
* **[ugly-kmeans](https://github.com/mrkaye97/ugly-kmeans)** is an over-the-top (yet imperfect) R solution to one of our data science technical interview questions: (roughly) implement K-Means
* **[espn-cfb-win-prob](https://github.com/mrkaye97/espn-cfb-win-prob)** runs diagnostics on ESPN's college football win probability model
